paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information including penetrance data from a study on Mexican-Mestizo breast cancer families.

patients.demographics: 252 unrelated sporadic breast cancer patients, mean age 40, Mexican-mestizo population

functional_data.summary: The most common BRCA2 mutation was c.1813delA, present in two samples.

variants.additional_notes: The study identified 12 pathogenic mutations in BRCA2.
key_quotes: A total of 38 patients were positive for a pathogenic mutation representing 15% of our Mexican women cohort with breast cancer: 25 for BRCA1 and 13 for BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
